PANEL

|

PANEL is a controllable and dynamic light installation designed for intense audiovisual performances. The project was conceived, built, and performed live in the studio space of RNDR.

Live Performance

VJDJ Night. RNDR. The Hague, Netherlands. December 17, 2021. Music by Rein van der Woerd.
